name: Mike Inez
birth_place: 美国,加利福尼亚州,旧金山
introduction: Mike Inez (born May 14, 1966) is a rock musician best known for his role as the bassist of Alice in Chains. Inez has also worked with other popular musical acts such as Ozzy Osbourne, Black Label Society, and Heart. Inez is of Filipino ancestry.Mike Inez began his career in music by playing guitar and saxophone.
